name: Magnet Invaders
description:
The Earth has been attacked by aliens, they have huge magnets that attract humans, They're kidnaping all the people in the cities. 

You are Earth's last hope, destroy the mothership magnet and avoid the mini magnets to join the big one. The more mini magnets join the human kidnapping speed rate increases.

Save the Earth!

Game developed for the 2021 Brakeys Game Jam "Stronger Together"

Sound Effects by  https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Monplaisir

Music by  https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise
